use_cases: ["Mapping unmapped sequence reads from koala C. pecorum strains to W73 reference genome to extract additional C. pecorum sequence data for genome assembly", "Including W73 genome in phylogenetic reconstruction of 20 C. pecorum genomes to determine evolutionary relationships", "Using W73 genome in core-genome alignment to identify single-nucleotide polymorphisms across C. pecorum strains", "Including W73 genome in recombination analysis using Gubbins algorithm to identify regions of recombination across C. pecorum genomes", "Comparing W73 genome with koala-derived C. pecorum genomes to assess synteny and sequence variation"]
